name: Passwordinator3000
description:
Passwordinator3000 is a tool to evaluate your knowledge about creating good passwords, you will learn to use good passwords, it the perfect game to wait until you arrive at your friend's office to put the passwords on the doors while you escape from someone, put good passwords that will prevent whoever is in the office from reaching you quickly, set the 4 passwords and leave the office, but that is only in the hypothetical case that you go to an office...

Made for the Cybersecurity Game Jam

Developer  Erizux, https://www.instagram.com/erizux.dev/
